content: this adorable sweet pea cardigan crochet pattern uses two of my favorite stitches extended single_crochet and the elizabeth stitch it is worked in turned row and starts at the top with a circle yolk this means no sewing materials-- capra dk from wecrochet in blush or any dk weight yarn 5 skeins 615 yds for 2 6 skeins 738 yds for 4 7 skeins 861 yds for 6 8 skeins 984 yds for 8 9 skeins 1 107 yds for 10 10 skeins 1 230 yds for 12 4 5 mm hook yarn needle scissors level-- intermediate approx finished size-- chest 2 20 25 4 21 25 6 24 5 8 26 10 29 5 12 30 75 length 2 15 4 15 5 6 16 8 16 5 10 17 12 17 5 armhole width 2 4 4 4 5 6 5 8 5 5 10 6 12 6 5 sleeve length from underarm 2 10 5 4 12 5 6 13 5 8 14 5 10 15 5 12 16 5 size 8 pictured written in us terms **if you have any questions please don t hesitate to contact me** you may not sell claim my patterns as your own make translations or video tutorials of my patterns you may sell finished products made from my patterns but please link back to the post and give credit for the pattern
